mapper.select: /* 글 목록 조회 */ SELECT community_no, community_title, community_author, community_date, community_hit, community_code, community_user_id FROM community_T where community_code = #{type} order by community_no desc;
mapper.insert: /* 글 작성 */ INSERT INTO community_T ( community_title, community_author, community_date, community_content, community_code, community_user_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{author}, now(), #{content}, #{code}, #{user_id} )
mapper.select: /* 글 상세 조회 */ SELECT community_no, community_title, community_author, community_content, community_date, community_hit, community_code, community_user_id FROM community_T where community_no = #{no};

/* 글 목록 검색 */ SELECT community_no, community_title, community_author, community_date, community_hit, community_code, community_user_id FROM community_T where community_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR community_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by community_no desc;
mapper.insert: /* 커뮤니티 댓글쓰기 */ INSERT INTO c_comment_T ( comment_user_nickName, community_no, comment_text, comment_date, comment_user_id ) VALUES ( #{user_nickName}, #{community_no}, #{text}, now(), #{user_id} )
mapper.select: /* 커뮤니티 댓글 전체 목록 */ SELECT comment_no, comment_user_nickName, community_no, comment_text, comment_date, comment_user_id FROM c_comment_t where community_no = #{no} order by comment_no asc;
